languages.text: {n}Его собратья хватаются было за оружие — и замирают, явно зачарованные мучениями бьющегося в агонии собрата.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Его собратья хватаются было за оружие — и замирают, явно зачарованные мучениями бьющегося в агонии собрата.{/n}

languages.text: {n}His kin move to draw their weapons, but freeze, transfixed by the sight of their brother thrashing in agony.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Его собратья хватаются было за оружие — и замирают, явно зачарованные мучениями бьющегося в агонии собрата.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}His kin move to draw their weapons and freeze, transfixed by the sight of their brother thrashing in agony.{/n}
{n}His kin move to draw their weapons and freeze, transfixed by the sight of their brother thrashing in agony.{/n}
{n}His kin move to draw their weapons and freeze, transfixed by the sight of their brother thrashing in agony.{/n}
{n}His kin move to draw their weapons and freeze, transfixed by the sight of their brother thrashing in agony.{/n}
{n}His kin move to draw their weapons, but freeze, transfixed by the sight of their brother thrashing in agony.{/n}
{n}His kin move to draw their weapons, but freeze, transfixed by the sight of their brother thrashing in agony.{/n}

languages.text: {n}キンたちは武器を取り出そうとするが、兄弟が苦しみにのたうち回る姿に目を奪われ、固まってしまう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His kin move to draw their weapons, but freeze, transfixed by the sight of their brother thrashing in agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}キンたちは武器を取り出そうとするが、兄弟が苦しみにのたうち回る姿に目を奪われ、固まってしまう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他的同伴立刻拔出武器，但目光却无法从痛苦挣扎的黑暗灵族身上移开。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His kin move to draw their weapons, but freeze, transfixed by the sight of their brother thrashing in agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他的同伴立刻拔出武器，但目光却无法从痛苦挣扎的黑暗灵族身上移开。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sus compañeros se disponen a sacar sus armas, pero se detienen, hipnotizados con la imagen de su hermano retorciéndose de agonía.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His kin move to draw their weapons, but freeze, transfixed by the sight of their brother thrashing in agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sus compañeros se disponen a sacar sus armas, pero se detienen, hipnotizados con la imagen de su hermano retorciéndose de agonía.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Die anderen wollen ihre Waffen ziehen, erstarren aber, gefesselt von dem Anblick, wie ihr Bruder sich vor Qualen windet.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His kin move to draw their weapons, but freeze, transfixed by the sight of their brother thrashing in agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Die anderen wollen ihre Waffen ziehen, erstarren aber, gefesselt von dem Anblick, wie ihr Bruder sich vor Qualen windet.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Subjugués par la vue de leur frère à l'agonie, ses semblables, qui s'apprêtaient à se saisir de leurs armes, se figent.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His kin move to draw their weapons, but freeze, transfixed by the sight of their brother thrashing in agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Subjugués par la vue de leur frère en train d'agoniser, ses semblables, qui s'apprêtaient à se saisir de leurs armes, se figent.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Silahlarını çekmeye yeltenen diğer Drukhariler ise yerde acı içinde kıvranan soydaşları karşısında büyülenip donakalıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}His kin move to draw their weapons, but freeze, transfixed by the sight of their brother thrashing in agony.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Diğer Drukhariler silahlarını çekmeye yeltense de, yerde acı içinde kıvranan soydaşlarının karşısında büyülenip donakalıyorlar.{/n}
